name: avg
description: Calculates the average (mean) value of a specified field across events in a group. Typically used within groupBy() function to compute statistical averages.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Numeric field to calculate the average of

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: Name for the output field containing the average value

notes: Useful for calculating metrics like mean time to respond (MTTR) or average resource utilization.
